Posts.Content: May 13, 2009 05:45PM JoeElla wrote: Another idea for keeping everyone up to date is using the Caring bridge site -   you update it and send the link to everyone interested.   They are sent a notification every time an update is made.  It would save you from emailing everyone.   They can also leave messages for your Mom.   It is a great free service.  This may sound strange but the entire process for me was a blessing -  it expanded my world.  I've met so many wonderful people , Drs and other "Breast Friends".  You change your outlook on life and appreciate everything.  There are sooooooo many kind, caring people out there.   Bless you and your family.  (Mom will so appreciate all your help)
